MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH22 postcode area of Dalkeith. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:38pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:41pm on Saturday, 13 March 2021
